testcase.name: Create a New Trello Board
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Create a New Trello Board Given a Trello API key API_KEY ... passed in 0.001s And a Trello API token TRELLO_TOKEN ... passed in 0.001s When I create a new Trello board with name Testing_assigment_1 and description This_is_a_test_board ... passed in 0.521s Then the API returns the new board details ... passed in 0.000s And I print or save the new board details to assigment_1_info.txt ... passed in 0.001s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
